# beget_additional_ip (Resource)

Beget Additional Public IP resource. Allows ordering and managing additional public IP addresses that can be attached to compute instances



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `region` (String) Region where the additional IP is ordered. Changing this field will recreate the IP resource

### Optional

- `compute_instance_id` (String) Compute Instance ID to attach the IP to. If not specified or set to null, the IP remains unattached (free)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Additional IP resource identifier. Automatically set to the IP address value
- `ip_address` (String) The allocated public IP address. Automatically assigned when the IP is ordered
